name: SPACE INVADERS Discord Bot
description:
I decided to make a game using Discord API and python, ended up making a SPACE INVADERS game for discord.

Commands in this bot:

  • $hello: Just to make the bot greet you.
  • $help: Just for fun.
  • $play: To play SPACE INVADERS
  • $stop: To stop playing SPACE INVADERS

I have also uploaded the source code on github:
https://github.com/SahilGupta1331/space_Invaders.
